AU.description: Not sure what to buy for that special someone? A Westfield Gift Card is the perfect choice so they can spend as they choose to. Accepted at over 8000 retailers, they will be sure to find something they love.
AU.name: Westfield | Gift Cards

AU.description: The humble t-shirt is a staple for every woman's wardrobe! Stock up on comfortable, good quality cotton basic tees in versatile black, white and grey or welcome summer with sweet sorbet shades like peach, lemon and musk. Prefer to make a statement? Look out for this season's sequin embellishments, pineapple prints, nautical stripes and metallic fabrics.
AU.name: Best of Women's T-Shirts

AU.description: Need an upgrade for an old wallet or looking for a thoughtful Christmas gift for your dad, brother, boyfriend or husband? Shop our edit of men's credit card sleeves, money clips, document wallets and bi-folds in sophisticated tan, black and grey or featuring on-trend denim, polkadot prints and exposed stitching.
AU.name: Best of Men's Wallets

AU.description: Studded black biker boots, patent leather boots, suede heeled boots or tan cowboy boots - however you like them, ankle boots are by far the best thing about winter! Layer biker and suede boots with chunky knits, leather pants and jeans, the perfect match with any outfit.
AU.name: Women's Ankle Boots

AU.description: Celebrate all things French with the tropical holiday inspired collection of floral kaftans, linen dresses, lightweight tops, printed scarves and elegant necklaces. The pieces ideal to layer into your daytime wardrobe as they can be slipped on with ease, are lightweight,  add colour and texture to your everyday classics.
AU.name: Blue Illusion | New In
AU.seo_title: Print dresses, shirts and and linen pants from Blue Illusion

AU.description: It's time to step up the pace in the latest spring running apparel & gymwear for men and women. Bright activewear from Rebel, Nike, Running Bare, The Athletes Foot, New Balance, Adidas and Hype.
AU.name: What to Wear | Running

AU.description: We're loving the cute collections catering for the small people in our lives. From adorable baby footwear, to cuddly toys they'll love for years, here's our favourites for little angels everywhere.
AU.name: Gifts for Little Ones
AU.seo_title: Gifts for young children and babies

US.description: Summer’s almost over, but thanks to highlighting, you can maintain that luminous glow well into fall. Simply apply your favorite product to all the high points of your face—including the center of your forehead, brow bones, cheekbones, down the bridge of your nose, and the center of your chin. Ahead, check out luminizing palettes, liquid illuminators, and more that will help you master the art of applying highlighter.
US.name: How to Highlight

US.description: The off-the-shoulder top has been a wildly popular look all year long. But as the weather cools, our friends at ELLE have a smart sartorial suggestion: Look for shoulder-baring styles in warm, cozy knits so you can continue to wear this trend through fall. Take a look at all the stylish picks below.
US.name: Shoulder On

US.description: An ELLE-approved fall trend, graffiti print brings a touch of the avant-garde to even the most ladylike piece. Shop all the street-art-inspired pieces below, from a paint-splattered handbag to a statement-making sweatshirt.
US.name: Street Smart

US.description: Every season ushers in a new denim trend and, according to ELLE, this fall is all about retro patchwork jeans. Tap into the ‘70s-inspired, bohemian style by perusing this selection of reworked jackets and contrast-panel jeans.
US.name: Patch It Up

US.description: You've RSVPed and picked out gifts from the registry. But as wedding season kicks into high gear, the most daunting task of all remains: finding a stylish yet appropriate dress to wear to the celebrations. Whether the invite calls for black-tie, cocktail attire, or semi-formal, we have you covered with frocks designed to make you the party's best-dressed guest.
US.name: Wedding Season: Still On!

US.description: Going for a full-on haunted house or simply want to add a festive Halloween touch to your home? We've rounded up an array of decorations—from the frightfully spooky to downright silly—that you can reuse year after year. Below, shop pumpkin votives, spiderweb-embellished pillows, and skeleton props that will get you and your trick-or-treaters into the holiday spirit.
US.name: Halloween at Home

US.description: Cool, sporty, and slightly utilitarian, the bomber jacket is one of fall’s must-have trends, according to ELLE. From a cozy shearling-trimmed option to a feminine floral-printed version, this lightweight, flight-jacket-inspired outerwear piece comes in a variety of styles. Discover some of the season’s best options below.
US.name: Top Flight

US.description: Exaggerated silhouettes are always on the agenda for fall—and this time around, the season's must-have is statement sleeves. Look for extra-long or dramatic silhouettes, like flared or bell-shaped sleeves, that are surprisingly wearable and easy to style.
US.name: Statement Sleeves

US.description: Fall fashion always calls for a little more romance and drama, so it's no surprise that ladylike bows are one of the season's most ubiquitous accents. Adorning everything from knit sweaters to heels and handbags, this charming detail isn't just for little girls anymore. Check out our selection of bow-embellished pieces that range from edgy to feminine and suit every style.
US.name: Take a Bow

US.description: Another New York Fashion Week has wrapped, which means plenty of street style fodder to enjoy. To celebrate all the fashion-forward looks we've been seeing lately, take a look at our selection of NYFW-inspired picks below. Even if you don't have a front-row invite to a runway show, you'll be sure to find a piece you'll love, whether it's an attention-grabbing clutch or a stunning pair of heels.
US.name: Best of NYFW
US.seo_title: Best of New York Fashion Week Style

US.description: According to ELLE, it’s high time to ditch that old hair elastic for a sophisticated, grown-up version. Thankfully, there are plenty of chic options available right now—from geometric ponytail holders to velvet ribbons and printed barrettes. Shop some of the latest and greatest below.
US.name: All Tied Up

US.description: Ditch your bright, punchy florals in favor of this season’s dark, moody blossoms—one of ELLE’s picks for fall. These petal-patterned pieces are less sweet and more serious, blooming on everything from silk dresses to slip-on sneakers. Check out the freshest florals below.
US.name: In Full Bloom

US.description: Meet fall’s most versatile handbag: the ELLE-approved slouchy satchel. The bag’s universal appeal lies in its soft yet structured shape, which can appear both sophisticated and playful. From a caramel leather version that goes with everything to a bohemian fringed iteration, explore the season’s most stylish picks below.
US.name: Get in Shape

US.description: Every October brings a deluge of pink ribbons, which symbolize the fight to end breast cancer. In honor of this year's Breast Cancer Awareness Month, we've gathered a variety of pink products—from kitchen appliances to jewelry—that bring awareness to the cause or help raise money for research. Shop all the items below.
US.name: Think Pink

US.description: Nowadays, we’re practically inseparable from our smartphones—so why not make sure they’re fashionably protected? Gone are the days of bulky, plain, or simply uninspiring cases. Whether you’re the owner of an iPhone, Android, or other version, we’ve tracked down attention-grabbing designs in sleek leather, glitter-flecked acrylic, or playfully patterned silicone. Dial up the style on your cell phone case with one of these must-haves.
US.name: Call on Me

US.description: Much to the delight of stiletto-weary feet, the sneaker trend is here to stay. ELLE’s current obsession for fall? Resurrected classics that offer a vintage yet modern feel. Join the sneakerheads by shopping these timeless kicks below.
US.name: Just for Kicks

US.description: Have no fear if your corporate uniform isn’t suitable for after-hours dinner and drinks. Just follow Marie Claire’s sartorial advice: Always be prepared for last-minute evening plans by stashing a few transitional pieces at the office. From a pair of fun party heels to an elegant evening clutch, shop all the essentials below.
US.name: From Work to Play

US.description: Get into the Halloween spirit this year without committing to a full-on costume you'll only wear once. Instead, channel spooky style in these creepy-cute pieces you can wear long after the holiday is over, from a pair of playful cat ears to a mysterious masquerade mask.
US.name: Spooky Style

US.description: According to Harper's BAZAAR, this season's best evening bags aren't just an afterthought—they're the statement piece. From a rhinestone-embellished clutch to a mixed-media minaudière, shop these high-impact accessories for fall below.
US.name: Good Evening

US.description: If you haven’t already spotted lace-up details everywhere, you’re about to, according to ELLE. This fall, the ubiquitous accent can appear a touch retro or lean a little nautical, but it’s always unquestionably stylish. See how to incorporate the tied-up trend with all the must-buy pieces below.
US.name: Lace Up

US.description: This fall, it’s completely acceptable to live in a graphic hoodie dress—one of ELLE’s It-items for fall. Excited that comfort is making a comeback? Master the too-cool-for-school look in slouchy hoodies, sweatshirts, and other stylish separates below.
US.name: Don't Sweat It

US.description: The weather’s a few degrees cooler, but it’s still not time to bring your chunky knits, boots, and heavy coats out of hibernation. To nail summer-to-fall dressing, go for transitional layers—such as airy blouses and lightweight jackets—that will take you through this tricky in-between season with ease.
US.name: Transitional Layers

US.description: Every on-the-go woman needs a hands-free handbag—one of Marie Claire’s must-haves for fall. Thankfully, this season offers chic, convenient carriers to suit all styles—whether you gravitate towards minimalist backpacks or classic cross-bodies. Below, explore the best to buy now.
US.name: Out of Hand

US.description: Now that it's officially fall, it's time to trade in your summer brights for more seasonally appropriate hues. And there's no better place to test-drive these colors than on your nails. From versatile neutrals in soft gray and rose gold to bolder shades like navy or jewel-toned amethyst, here are all the pretty polishes (and tools) you may need for your next mani and pedi.
US.name: Nailed It

US.description: No matter what you may have on your social calendar this fall—girls’ night outs, cocktail parties, black-tie galas—make sure you go for a retro-luxe vibe (one of the season’s biggest trends, according to our friends at Harper’s BAZAAR). To master the look, shop sequined dresses, velvet platform shoes, and much more below.
US.name: Party On
US.seo_title: What to Wear for a Night Out

US.description: For the past few years, over-the-knee boots have become the de rigueur shoe for fall and winter and, according to ELLE, this season’s no different. Not only do these boots offer extra coverage during the colder months, they also make a stylish statement whether paired with a miniskirt or worn over skinny jeans. Explore dozens of trendsetting options below.
US.name: Boot Camp

US.description: Ruffles, flounces, and frills? No longer just for little girls. According to ELLE, the season’s must-have is a ruffled blouse, whether it’s in the form of a dramatic tiered bell sleeve or a voluminous frill across the shoulders. Embrace your feminine, romantic sensibilities by shopping the look below.
US.name: All Frills

US.description: The right pair of sunglasses can pull your look together in an instant. Get on board with the latest styles for fall (ELLE’s favorite is a flattering cat-eye and aviator mash-up) with the must-have shades below.
US.name: Frame of Mind

US.description: Sleek, modern, and minimalist, geometric jewelry is one of ELLE’s picks for fall. Look for graphic shapes, angular pieces, and sculptural silhouettes that add just the right amount of edge to any ensemble by shopping the options below.
US.name: Cutting Edge

US.description: Check out our roundup of the best Columbus Day markdowns on everything from workwear essentials to party dresses, designer handbags, jewelry, and more.
US.name: Columbus Day Sales

US.description: If there's one accessory to invest in this year, it's the statement earring! We round up our favourite pairs for every budget and style.
US.name: Trending: Statement Earrings

US.description: Maxi dresses are a girl's best friend during summer! Here are our favorites you can shop now.
US.name: The Best of Maxi Dresses
US.seo_title: Women's summer maxi and midi dresses.

US.description: Talk about a conversation starter! The latest "It" bags are novelty purses that add a dose of playful personality to your look. From a cupcake-shaped cross-body to a disco ball minaudière, shop our roundup of clutches and carryalls featuring embellishments, punchy colors, bold graphics, and clever catchphrases.
US.name: Get a Purse-onality

US.description: Cutouts aren't the new kid on the block, but lately, designers are putting a fresh spin on the trend: a knit sweater with split-open shoulders, a cocktail dress with an unexpected revealing back, or a jumpsuit with a navel-grazing vent. The best part? From a subtle peek-a-boo effect to a skin-revealing slash, there's a style to suit every comfort level.
US.name: Cool Cutouts

US.description: Save your sky-high heels for the weekend. From low-heeled loafers to sophisticated slingbacks, these footwear options make your office trek a little more bearable—without sacrificing style.
US.name: Commuter-Friendly Shoes

US.description: Accessories make the outfit, so why should men miss out on the fun? From statement-making timepieces to work-worthy carryalls, here are the best ways for dudes to dress up their look.
US.name: Men Deserve Accessories, Too

US.description: Your skincare needs change with the seasons, so to prepare for cooler weather, update your daily regimen with richer creams, facial oils, and other complexion-boosting essentials.
US.name: Seasonal Skin Prep

US.description: Always on the go? Shift your style into high gear with fashionable, functional activewear you can sport all day long.
US.name: All-Day Workout Gear

US.description: Running from work to play means there's hardly any time for an outfit change. To help you master day-to-night dressing, we've rounded up versatile pieces that seamlessly transition from corporate office to after-hours cocktails.
US.name: Easy Day-to-Night Dressing

US.description: The most unexpected color dominating this season? Yellow, in every shade from chartreuse to citrine. Go all out in brightly colored knits and outerwear or, if you have yet to embrace the hue, experiment with wearable accessories in subdued mustard and goldenrod. Either way, you'll brighten up your look for fall.
US.name: Fall's Hottest Color

US.description: The ladylike look always enjoys a resurgence in the fall, which is why pleated midi skirts (an ELLE-approved trend) are essential this season. Nail the vibe in flowing, feminine styles with below-the-knee hemlines suitable for both work and play. Explore a variety of pretty and pleated picks below.
US.name: Pleats Please

UK.description: Take outerwear into the new season with our latest jackets and coats. Casual layering is made easy with the bomber - think padded details and camo prints that are perfectly pared-back with jeans. The puffer jacket is also a key style for Autumn/Winter, while the biker jacket gets updated with slouchy fits, studs and faux fur collars. Need something with a little more day-to-night versatility? Try a softly tailored blazer that doubles as a dress worn with tights. Finish the look with a perspex heel boot for effortless cool.
UK.name: New Season Outerwear at TOPSHOP

UK.description: Coats and jackets are the ultimate autumn/winter investment and we've updated classic styles to make covering up from the cold all the more relevant.
UK.name: Investment Coats and Jackets at Reiss

UK.description: Sweet and sentimental; sleek and stylised – the new treasure-forever jewellery designs are here.
UK.name: The Autumn Collection at PANDORA

UK.description: The Autumn/Winter collection from Moncler has launched at Base featuring a stunning mix of luxury Italian-wear for boys and girls from 0-14 years.
UK.name: Moncler Kids Arrives at Base

UK.description: Pink Soda Sport is a collection of fitness and lifestyle essentials designed for women who love to look good while working out. This season, it's all about mix and match pieces that work way beyond the gym. Signature sports bras and performance leggings come loaded with all the usual tech features, but are given a new-season refresh with shatter-print graphics, tonal grey panels and sleek, rose-gold details.
UK.name: Pink Soda Sport

UK.description: Shadows are lengthening, the light has turned golden and leaves are beginning to fall. Itcan only be the start of autumn, season of scarves and cardigans, blustery stomps thatcrunch underfoot and snug evenings-in by the fire. We have some exciting new recipesthat we just can’t wait for you to try including some amazing new Crumbles!
UK.name: Nostalgic Crumbles & Comforting Caramels at Hotel Chocolat

UK.description: Beat the timer. Sweat it out. Train through the pain. Push yourself harder. No pain, no gain.
UK.name: RI Active at River island
